TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameCreationService

summary.span: 提供可以生成对象的唯一名称的服务。

span.span: Provides a service that can generate unique names for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以实现此服务提供一种方法为设计器创建新的对象的唯一名称。A can implement this service to provide a way for a designer to create new, unique names for objects. 如果此服务不可用，则该设计器使用的默认实现。If this service is not available, the designer uses a default implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个示例实现。The following example code provides an example implementation. 该服务可以创建基于与指定的容器中的任何名称不匹配的类型的唯一名称。The service can create a unique name based on a type that does not match any names in the specified container. 它还可以验证指定的名称字符串。It can also validate a specified name string. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateName (System.ComponentModel.IContainer container, Type dataType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateName(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container, class System.Type dataType) cil managed
Public Function CreateName (container As IContainer, dataType As Type) As String

param.name: container
param.span: 将新对象添加到的容器。

span.span: The container where the new object is added.

param.name: dataType
param.span: 接收该名称的对象的数据类型。

span.span: The data type of the object that receives the name.

summary.span: 创建一个新名称，该名称对于指定容器中的所有组件来说是唯一的。

span.span: Creates a new name that is unique to all components in the specified container.
A unique name for the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回在指定的容器中是唯一的新对象的名称。This method returns a name for the new object that is unique within the specified container. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了示例方法实现。The following code example provides an example method implementation. 该方法可以创建基于是唯一的名称对指定容器中的组件的指定类型的名称的名称。The method can create a name based on the name of a specified type that is unique to the names of the components within the specified container. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

para.span: 此类型的服务通常实现从数据类型，通常追加一个数字以使该名称可以是唯一的标识符的名称创建一个唯一的对象名。

span.span: This type of service is often implemented to create a unique object name from the name of the data type, often appended with a number that allows the name to be a unique identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidName(string name) cil managed
Public Function IsValidName (name As String) As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定名称是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.

returns.span: 如果该名称有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the name is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现可以定义有效的名称的参数的规则。An implementation of the can have rules that define the parameters for valid names. 可实现此方法来验证名称和强制实施这些规则。This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了示例方法实现。The following code example provides an example method implementation. 该方法使用字符串验证方案来检查以确定指定的字符串是否为有效名称的指定字符串的每个字符。The method uses a string validation scheme that examines each character of the specified string to determine whether the specified string is a valid name. 该方法返回`true`字符串是否有效，或`false`否则为。The method returns `true` if the string is valid, or `false` otherwise. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateName(string name) cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定名称是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现可以定义有效的名称的参数的规则。An implementation of the can have rules that define the parameters for valid names. 可实现此方法来验证名称和强制实施这些规则。This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules. 此方法类似于是，只不过此方法将引发异常，如果该名称无效。This method is similar to , except that this method throws an exception if the name is invalid. 这允许实施者能提供的异常消息中的详细的信息。This allows implementers to provide detailed information in the exception message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了示例方法实现，使用字符串验证方案来检查以确定指定的字符串是否为有效名称的指定字符串的每个字符。The following code example provides an example method implementation that uses a string validation scheme that examines each character of the specified string to determine whether the specified string is a valid name. 如果字符串不是有效，则该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the string is not valid. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#4)]
